author: sami
title: Demos gegen rechts
question: Ganz Deutschland organisiert Demos gegen die rechtsextremen. Gibts das in Passau auch?

answers.answer:
Soll wohl was geben kommenden Samstag aber genaue Infos findest du irgendwie kaum
hier is ein Link: https://www.buergerblick.de/nachrichten/passau-anti-afd-demo-am-27-januar-geplant-a-67090.html
answers.author: max

author: sami
title: Best veterinary practice in Passau?
question: Hey everyone, I'm trying to find the best vet in Passau especially for cats. There's one I've been to a few times and things have been fine so far, I just feel like the check ups and visits happen too quick (to the point where I'm not entirely sure whether the doctor is just that good or if they're not being thorough enough) and things get really expensive really quickly. Do y'all have any recommendations?

answers.answer: Dr. Rentsch in Passau or Dr. Krause (expensive) Also get a insurence for your pet.
answers.author: max

author: sami
title: Looking to Connect with Fellow Students!
question:
Hey everyone,

Excited to share that I'll be starting my journey in Artificial Intelligence Engineering at Passau University this summer, kicking off in 2024! üöÄ Wondering if there are others out there who'll be joining this program around the same time?

I thought it would be awesome to connect, maybe start a group chat, and share experiences or even plan ahead for the upcoming semester. So, if you're also diving into the world of AI or any other Master program at Passau, feel free to drop a message here or shoot me a DM. Let's build a community and make the most of this academic adventure together!

Looking forward to connecting with you all!

Cheers! üéìü§ñ

answers.answer:
Hi there! Congratulations.

I am not a new student; in fact about to graduate the program in a month or two. However, there is a telegram group chat for AIE students, both old and new. If you'd like that, I can DM the invite over.
answers.author: max
